name: I Can Gun (itch)
description:
Experience a first-person shooter with a twist: You will need to operate your weapon in full detail (press F1 in-game to toggle an interactive help) while scavenging  a procedurally generated level protected by machines that don't even know what mercy is.

I really would like to turn this into an actual product with even more content and features. Please support me to make this happen.

Please share your experience. Also feel free to join the Discord server: https://discordapp.com/invite/ekqXSrm
